title: Science Inquiry Project Utilizing Narrative Distance: Transformative Learning Experience Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science concepts comprehension (no experimental design or data interpretation skills)
context.additional_context: Integration of digital device-based science experiment simulations with project-based learning, guiding learners to define their own questions and explore solutions through narrative approaches

learning_goals: Learners can analyze narrative scenarios about scientific phenomena and present at least three alternative interpretations
Learners can collect experimental data using digital tools and write reports (3+ pages) considering narrative distance
Learners can present creative solutions to scientific problems in project format, incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
